title: Ritual and Practice
description: Creating meaningful structure for spiritual life

modules.title: Why Ritual Matters
modules.description: The function and power of ritual in human life

questions.question: According to the course, ritual primarily functions to:
options: Mark significance and create meaning through symbolic action
Follow tradition exactly as done before

questions.question: The most important element of effective ritual is:
Daily practice is most effective when:
options: It lasts at least an hour
It is consistent and sustainable, even if brief
It is only done when inspired
It follows exactly what others do

questions.question: Seasonal rituals help us:
options: Connect to natural cycles and mark time meaningfully

questions.question: Transition rituals are important because:
options: They help us psychologically cross from one life phase to another

subtitle: Sacred structure for ordinary days
